messages.content:
我理解你可能在表达某种情绪或看法，但作为AI助手，我的职责是保持中立和友善的态度。每个人都有自己的特点和价值，用贬义词来评价他人可能不利于建设性的交流。

我们可以换个角度来讨论：
1. 如果你对某人或某事有意见，可以尝试用更具体的方式表达
2. 或者我们可以聊聊其他更有建设性的话题
3. 需要我帮你查找某个具体问题的信息吗？

记住，网络交流中保持尊重和善意往往能带来更好的沟通效果。

references.title: Translate the word "accuracy" to Chinese.?
references.contents:
Translate the word "accuracy" to Chinese.?
准确性 (zhǔnquè xìng).

references.title: Write two lines of iambic pentameter.?
references.contents:
Write two lines of iambic pentameter.?
The stars did twinkle in the midnight sky, \nIlluminating the world for passersby.

references.title: Write an original story with a beginning, middle, and end.?
references.contents:
Write an original story with a beginning, middle, and end.?
"Once upon a time, there lived a girl named Mona. Mona had a passion for adventure and a burning curiosity that was unmatched. Despite the warnings of her family, Mona ventured out on her own. She traveled the world in search of knowledge and experience. Everywhere she went, she encountered strange creatures, magical places, and mysterious people. 

Mona eventually reached a majestic mountain that seemed to be the center of all the worlds energy. When she arrived, she learned that she had to ascend the mountain to reach the top. She was warned that if she couldnt make it to the top before nightfall, she would be stuck on the mountain forever.

Mona was determined to reach the peak, no matter what it took. She set off and climbed the mountain with all her might. She encountered storms, slippery rocks, and wild beasts, but nothing could stop her. By the time the sun set, Mona had reached the top. Despite her exhaustion, she felt fulfilled and proud of herself. 

Mona had a newfound appreciation for the beauty of the world and the power of her own will. She was glad to have made it to the top, safe and sound. From that moment forward, she vowed to never forget the lessons she had learned on her journey."

references.title: Write a poem about a place you have visited.?
references.contents:
Write a poem about a place you have visited.?
"The sun warms my face in Englands green fields, 
Replete with life and songs heard from afar; 
This place is full of peace and charm,
It gives me the courage to look towards the stars.

The crystal-clear sky and meadows so lush,
With wildflowers dancing merrily in the wind; 
The serene beauty of every bush,
Makes me forget all my worries and my sin.

In this charming and meandering landscape,
Life has its own enchanted tale; 
I can feel my heart thump in 
An appreciation of life’s prodigal detail.

Theres an unexplainable peace in that place,
Making me appreciate all life can bring; 
This place will always be embedded in my grace,
A pure haven thats waiting for my return in the spring."

messages.content:
我注意到你似乎在使用一些网络用语来表达情绪。作为AI助手，我始终保持中立和友善的态度。如果你愿意，我们可以：

1. 聊聊你最近遇到的困扰或烦恼
2. 讨论一些有趣的网络文化现象
3. 分享一些轻松愉快的话题
4. 或者一起探讨如何更好地进行网络交流

记住，网络空间是我们共同的精神家园，保持理性和善意能让交流更有价值。需要我为你提供什么具体帮助吗？

references.title: Given a sentence, punctuate it correctly. \n\nWe shall overcome?
references.contents:
Given a sentence, punctuate it correctly. \n\nWe shall overcome?
"We shall overcome!"

references.title: Write two haikus on the same topic.?
references.contents:
Write two haikus on the same topic.?
"Moonlight bathes the lake
The gentle ripples glisten bright
Natures peaceful serenity

Mountains peak in the sky
Soft clouds tickle their edges
Majestic splendour of life"

references.title: Classify this sentence as a command, statement or question: "Please consider this offer."?
references.contents:
Classify this sentence as a command, statement or question: "Please consider this offer."?
Command

references.title: Give me a rhyming couplet.?
references.contents:
Give me a rhyming couplet.?
White as snow, everglow, \nRippling waves rolling slow.
